channel.title: Delta Drop System
channel.description:
since im new to delta and havn't been able to find where it's drop system is used, im just wondering...
how would i go about adding a monster that drops party hat's at a 0.1% drop rate oh getting any p-hat
where wuld i add the code? wat wuld the code look like?
all help apreciated :D :) ;D

item.title: Delta Drop System
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

thats off-topic lmao

i put that in my sig a long time ago b4 i started using delta, no clue how to change signature on stupid smf forums…

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Drop System
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

What’s with the Anti-Delta in your signature and yet you post a delta focused thread.

Stop trying to be ‘cool’ to fit in with everyone else that knows something. It’s alright if you don’t know a lot, just don’t lie about it.

Read full topic
